text:
@Jim_Jordan @realDonaldTrump Amazing for what?
What about the 65k people plus who died already.There's no pat on the back ever on this..
Trump failed to act in the beginning and avoid the signs that he had, now your talking about amazing shit? 
There's nothing amazing! About being the leader in #coronavirus
